Oh, and I suppose now you're going to bring in Optimus
Primal as a bat and Megatron as an Alligator?

--- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, there is such a thing as action
> figures, don't be dumb..
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: dewboy30816@... 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>   Subject: Re: Optimus Fury
> 
> 
>   I've seen all 3 seasons (reruns anyway) and all
> the bots I remember 
>   had BEAST MODES! Are you thinking of another
> series or did they just 
>   cut him out for the reruns?
>

> wrote:
>   > OOC: Dewboy, I know you don't have much
> knowledge of Beast wars, so
